code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{firebaseReducer}from'react-redux-firebase';import{firestoreReducer}from'redux-firestore';import shop from'./Shop.js';import cart from"./cart";var appReducer=combineReducers({shop:shop,cart:cart,firestore:firestoreReducer,firebase:firebaseReducer});var rootReducer=function rootReducer(state,action){return appReducer(state,action);};export default rootReducer;
